sendSecureMessageEnabled.description: Whether to send secure messages for transfer timeouts

secureMessageCategory.description: Category for secure messages sent for transfer timeouts

sendEmailEnabled.description: Whether to send emails for transfer timeouts

recipientEmail.description: Email address to receive transfer timeout notifications

senderEmail.description: Email address to send transfer timeout notifications from

secureMessageSenderMembershipUserId.description: Membership user ID for the sender of secure messages

emailSenderName.description: Display name for the sender of timeout notification emails
